activities:
Zephyr Health receives personal information from its EU and Swiss customers, organization human resources data for Zephyr Health employees located in the EU and Switzerland, and personal information available on the Internet or public domain. Zephyr Health uses this information to: 
1. Support the processing of our Business Services.
2. Maintain our customer accounts and records.
3. Carryout our contractual and legal obligations.
4. Support and manage our employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Any personal data provided to us by our customers, our employees, information we log when using our Website or Services, and information we collect on the Internet from public websites.
privacyprograms: A self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
